br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Class NCLCompoundCondition<C extends NCLCondition,S extends NCLStatement,P extends NCLConnectorParam>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.NCLCompoundCondition<C,S,P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLCondition<C,P>, Element, java.lang.Comparable<C>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLCompoundCondition<C extends NCLCondition,S extends NCLStatement,P extends NCLConnectorParam>
extends NCLElement
implements NCLCondition<C,P>

Esta classe define o elemento compoundCondition da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define uma condição composta de um conector de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
